ComicInfo.Summary: Baptism of Fire: She-Dragon finds herself banished to Dimension X where she quickly becomes enslaved by the powerful Gorgod. When she is transferred from being a simple manual laborer to a member of the Gorgod's harem, however, she rebels and battles her new master. With Gorgod's death, his planet begins falling apart, leaving his subjects to flee in terror. She-Dragon meets up with another exile, Dragon's adopted daughter Angel, and together they find their way out of Dimension X and back to Earth.
ComicInfo.Title: Baptism of Fire
